DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Electrical Stimulation Kinesio Taping Recovery Disability Low Back Pain
DOC.criteria: 1 . LBP three month ; 2. age 25 65 year ; 3. score four point Roland Morris Disability Questionnaire ; 4. currently receive physical therapy . 1. presence lumbar stenosis ; 2. clinical sign radiculopathy ; 3. diagnosis spondylolisthesis ; 4. diagnosis fibromyalgia ; 5. treatment corticosteroid oral medication within past two week ; 6. history spinal surgery ; 7. disease central peripheral nervous system .
